name: 43rd World Congress on Oral Care & Dentistry
content: We request you add our conference to your website to reach more people. Conference Name: 43rd World Congress on Oral Care & Dentistry Dates: November 24-25, 2022 Venue: Berlin, Germany. Theme: “Briefing the New Techniques in Dentistry and Oral Care”. URL: https://oralcare.dentistryconferences.com/ Description: Conference Series LLC Ltd invites participants from all over the world to attend its upcoming “43rd World Congress on Oral Care & Dentistry” during November 24-25, 2022 in London, UK. 43rd World Congress on Oral Care & Dentistry will be organized around the theme “Briefing the New Techniques in Dentistry and Oral Care”. 43rd World Congress on Oral Care & Dentistry Conference includes prompt Keynote Presentations Workshops Oral Talks Poster presentations e-poster and Exhibitions. Regards, Maria Robbie DENTAL MEETING 2022 robbiemaria603@gmail.com
